activities: We are a software firm that conducts employee opinion surveys. We analyze the data and advise clients on improving workplace experience. We collect employee email addresses, likert-based employee opinions, comments, and some demographic info (age, position level, tenure, department). We do not collect financial information or social security numbers. For clients that pay with a credit card, our bank merchant account performs transactions. We do not store credit card information.
personaldata: online employee survey data, hr data
privacyprograms: Our data servers are protected by SSL certificates.
recoursemech: We will use JAMS as our dispute resolution body.
